page.title: 20Credits
page.content: We are indebted to the following people for the help given while compiling this picture of life in Auchterhouse.{The Rev.Mr.J.Hamilton, retired minister, {Mr.I.Baird,}farmer, {Mr.R.Cant,Mr.G.Mackie, }ex-pupils. To the pupils who wrote and typed the scripts:_{Dougal Baird,Paul Cunningham {Leonie Paterson,Elizabeth Skea,David {Soutar,P7.Nicola Drurie,Jane Gordon, {Sonya Meldrum,Gail Paterson,Karen {Spalding,P6.Stewart Bateman,Fraser {Gilmour,P5.}The pupils who helped with the survey:_{Euan Baird,Lee Cunningham {William Dey,John Skea,Kerry Smith, {Andrew Stewart,P4.Karen Gilmour, Neil {Paterson,P3.Diarmid Baird,Graeme Smith {Cameron Tait,P2}and{Laura Costello,} and{Martin Dey}in{P1.} The Staff:_ {Mr.W.Allison}and {Mrs.A. {Soutar.}
